topic.title: To create the custom process visual button

ol.li: Go to Setup and navigate to the process object you desire to create the button.
Select the Buttons, Links, and Actions link and click New Button or Link.
Enter a Label, Name, and Description for the button.

Select these parameters:
Display Type: Detail Page Button
Behavior: Display in the new window
Content Source: URL
Add the button to all applicable Page Layouts on the Process Object.
